channel.title: Membership from stats?
channel.description: how do i make it so if u get all 99 stats it adds ur name to Members.txt in my data folder?

item.title: Membership from stats?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

go to levelup method somewhere in client where it says “Congrats your " + Level + " firemaking.” etc…

and add a check

if(skilltotal == (18*99)) { //i think there is 18 stats in rs2 not sure.
appendtoFileCodeOrMethod(“members.txt”);
}

thats assumming ur max stats are 99 cuz if they are not this will not work u gotta than check all stats if each is 99 with a loop like

…levelup codes here…
for(int stat : playerLevel) {
if(stat >= 99) continue;
return;
}
…if you reach here then you can append to members.txt cuz all stats are 99 or higher (also add code to check if member is already on list. cuz it will keep addin over and over

Read full topic
